text: as we become an increasingly connected
society the amount of data being created
and collected is growing at exponential
rates
big data technologies offer new
opportunities to analyze the data more
efficiently
choosing the right technologies to
collect analyze and visualize data is a
critical step to better understanding
customer preferences gaining a
competitive advantage and growing your
business with the volume velocity and
variety of data we have today companies
are often constrained by their
infrastructure's ability to deploy
process and scale new applications or be
agile enough to keep current big data in
bi solutions found in aws marketplace
remove these constraints
the tools you need to gain new insights
and make accurate and timely business
decisions are right now ready to run on
aws an infrastructure that's known for
its ease of use security speed
reliability and elasticity through an
easy to use interface you can launch
your favorite big data tools and
applications on aws in minutes gaining
the flexibility and scalability of the
cloud while managing those familiar
applications the way you always have the
fact is big data doesn't have to be
complex and overwhelming there are three
simple steps to consider number one
prepare and load your data
number two create reports and
visualizations and three operationalized
models for predictive and automated
analysis
aws marketplace has a rich catalog of
business analytic tools let's review a
collection of our most popular solutions
data integration the ability to pool and
clean data is essential for gaining
accurate insights data analysis can take
place regardless of the data's location
but if you need to process or distribute
it faster solutions are available in aws
marketplace which lets you migrate data
to amazon s3 redshift or rds in a
fraction of the time either all at once
or in planned migrations
solutions from sellers such as matillion
informatica and attunity provide market
leading tools that prepare your data for
fast loading into services such as
amazon redshift business intelligence
and data visualization tools are the
changing the way we make decisions by
helping make complex data easy to
understand in real time
solutions from companies like tableau
tipco and microstrategy let you
visualize your historic and current data
they also give you a wide-angle view of
your data by letting you gain insights
from all of your aws data sources
including amazon redshift dynamodb and
elastic mapreduce and customize how that
data is seen across an organization
advanced analytics the ability to detect
patterns that cannot easily be
visualized is increasingly essential for
businesses to exceed in addition to be
able to analyze historic data equally
important questions that need to be
answered are what will happen in the
future
when will it happen and how can we avoid
it or make something else happen
this is where advanced analytics come
into play
aws marketplace is where you can find
solutions from sap
zamentis and maplarge to process and
analyze your data
many of the software solutions available
from vendors in aws marketplace can be
deployed immediately that means you're
able to start working with solutions in
minutes rather than months
with free trials and pay-as-you-go
options you're able to try new or
familiar products and quickly discover
which solution meets your organization's
needs
and since many products in aws
marketplace are priced on utility
consumption models you don't need to
worry about over or under provisioning
or counting licenses
the bi solutions in aws marketplace were
created to help customers not only stay
current but ahead of the curve as the
big data services landscape continues to
evolve we've seen many other companies
such as unilever pfizer and netflix
